extendedInfo.description: Foodservice Radio is the 24-hour streaming radio station programmed specifically for the food service operator.  The radio station features a mixture of food service news, business building & management intelligence, new product information and cost-saving tips.  Everything the restaurant or food service operator needs to profitably grow their business.The Foodservice Radio app allows you to stream the station directly to your SmartPhone and provides a direct link to the mobile website.Foodservice Radio streams at 64K to minimize the data required and provide a reliable connection.  You should still have a data plan with your carrier however, before using this app.

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: I like this app. Always good to hear what my competition is doing, and I don\'t have much time to read these days.
reviews.author: A Google User
